byline: Adam Allington, David Gura, Sally Herships, Zach Crockett and Tommy Andres
teaser: Airing on January 2, 2015: The first college football playoffs are upon us, and they are a huge moneymaker for football and colleges. The biggest question may be how quickly they can be expanded. Plus, we uncover the story behind a notoriously creepy Domino's mascot from the 1980s, the Noid.

title: Marketplace for Friday January 2, 2015
